珖字的基本解释

珖
guāng
玉笛。
玉名。

珖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guāng］
［《集韻》姑黄切，平唐，見。］
(1)玉名。用作人名。汉有冯珖。见《後汉书·冯鲂传》。
(2)见“珖瑯”。

珖字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珖； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页730第16
【集韻】【韻會】?姑黃切，音光。【玉篇】琯也。【集韻】玉名。　又人名。【後漢·馮魴傳】孫珖官至城門校尉。

玉名。用作人名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guāng］
["Ji Yun" Gu Huangqie, Ping Tang, see you. ]
(1) Jade name. Used as a person's name. There is Feng Jiu in the Han Dynasty. See "The Book of the Later Han·Feng Biao Biography".
(2) See "Jiulang".
珖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珖; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 730 16
[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Gu Huangqie, sound and light. [Jade articles] Guan Ye. 【Jiyun】The name of a jade.　Another name. [Later Han·Feng Bi Biography] Sun Jiuguan went to the gate of the school lieutenant.
